languages.text: {n}Джай качает головой, заметив клеймо на вашей шее.{/n} "Когда-то я считала, что только милость Великого должна отпечатываться на образе Вольного Торговца... неужели оно того стоит, шерин?"

{n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай качает головой, заметив клеймо на вашей шее.{/n} "Когда-то я считала, что только милость Великого должна отпечатываться на образе Вольного Торговца... неужели оно того стоит, шерин?"

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae menea la cabeza al ver la marca de tu cuello.{/n} «Pensaba que la gracia del Exaltado debía dejar huella en la persona de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente... ¿De verdad merece la pena, shereen?».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae menea la cabeza al ver la marca de tu cuello.{/n} «Pensaba que la gracia del Exaltado debía dejar huella en la persona de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente... ¿De verdad merece la pena, shereen?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊发现你脖子上的烙印之后，摇了摇头。{/n}“我曾经以为，只有至高无上的神皇，才有权在行商浪人的身上留下印记……这真的值得吗，亲爱的？”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊发现你脖子上的烙印之后，摇了摇头。{/n}“我曾经以为，只有至高无上的神皇，才有权在行商浪人的身上留下印记……这真的值得吗，亲爱的？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイはあなたの首にある刻印を見て首を振る。{/n}「以前のあたしは、エグザルテッド・ワンの寵愛だけが自由開拓者の人間にその証しを残すべきだと考えていた…本当にその価値があると思う、シャリーン？」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはあなたの首にある刻印を見て首を振る。{/n}「以前のあたしは、エグザルテッド・ワンの寵愛だけが自由開拓者の人間にその証しを残すべきだと考えていた…本当にその価値があると思う、シャリーン？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae secoue la tête à la vue de la marque sur votre cou.{/n} « Moi qui croyais que seule la grâce de l'Exalté était digne d'apposer son sceau sur l'auguste personne d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}... Le jeu en vaut-il vraiment la chandelle, shereen ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae secoue la tête à la vue de la marque sur votre cou.{/n} « Moi qui croyais que seule la grâce de l'Exalté était digne d'apposer son sceau sur l'auguste personne d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}... Le jeu en vaut-il vraiment la chandelle, shereen ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae schüttelt den Kopf, als sie das Brandmal an deinem Hals entdeckt.{/n} "Ich dachte früher, nur die Gnade des Erhabenen sollte ihren Stempel auf der Persönlichkeit eines Freihändlers hinterlassen ... Ist es das wirklich wert, Shereen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae schüttelt den Kopf, als sie das Brandmal an deinem Hals entdeckt.{/n} "Ich dachte früher, nur die Gnade des Erhabenen sollte ihren Stempel auf der Persönlichkeit eines Freihändlers hinterlassen ... Ist es das wirklich wert, Shereen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"

languages.text: {n}Jae, boynundaki damgayı fark ettiğinde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Eskiden bir Hür Tacir'in üzerinde izini bırakabilecek tek şeyin Görkemli'nin lütfu olduğunu düşünürdüm. Buna değdi mi gerçekten şirinim?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head when she spots the brand on your neck.{/n} "I used to think only the grace of the Exalted One should leave its imprint on the person of a Rogue Trader... Is it really worth it, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae boynundaki işareti fark ettiğinde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Eskiden bir Hür Tacir'in üzerinde izini bırakabilecek tek şeyin Görkemli'nin lütfu olduğunu düşünürdüm. Buna değdi mi gerçekten şirinim?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
